Texts.Chs: 然而，我的喜悦是短暂的。我回到宿舍，发现我的秘密藏匿处被打乱，珍贵的增强药剂也不见了。一根红色的羽毛落在那里。到底是意外还是挑衅？我知道谁该为此负责。大喙，也许是我们当中除了我之外最强壮的翼族人。她从第一天起就一直在找我的茬。
Texts.Eng: My joy was short-lived, however. I returned to the dorms to find my secret stash disturbed, my bottles of precious enhancement gone. A red feather sat in their place. An accident or a defiant message? I knew who was responsible. Larbeaks, perhaps the strongest Avian in the class besides me. She's been gunning for me since day one.

Texts.Chs: 我从来没有想过我会如此强大，如此不可阻挡。我们进入了角斗场，然后我一个接一个地击败对手。当我做完这一切后，其余的人躺在我周围的地板上，呻吟着，用他们眼中的恶意看着我。他们很虚弱，很可怜。
Texts.Eng: Never before have I felt so powerful, so unstoppable. We took to the gladiatorial arena, and I threw down against opponent after opponent. When I was done, my entire class lay sprawled on the floor around me, groaning, looking at me with malice in their eyes. They are weak, pathetic.
